title: Chest/Key earned notifications repeating on login
body: Every time I log in, I get a pop up notification congratulating me for earning a chest, followed by a second letting me know I earned a key fragment. This issue started maybe six or so games ago when I got a chest and a key fragment from the same match. I have checked and I'm NOT earning a free chest and key fragment, it's just saying I did each time.

replies.body: It is a known bug, we currently have people looking at that bug {{champion:74}}
Thank you for looking at it. I've had the same bug and if you could please also take a look at the issue of data not appearing at the post-game screen.
Sweet, good to know you guys are working on this!
More than a year later, this is still a problem >_>
